plugins.name: Data Replicator
plugins.description: Replicates data from a local InfluxDB 3 Core/Enterprise instance to a remote InfluxDB 3 instance. Supports filtering of tables and fields, renaming of tables and fields, and queue management for reliable delivery.
plugins.author: InfluxData

plugins.name: Downsampler
plugins.description: Enables downsampling of data in an InfluxDB 3 instance with flexible configuration for time intervals, field aggregations, tag filtering, and batch processing. Supports both scheduler and HTTP trigger modes.
plugins.author: InfluxData

plugins.name: Forecast Error Evaluator
plugins.description: Evaluates the accuracy of forecast models by comparing predicted values with actual observations. Computes error metrics (MSE, MAE, RMSE) and detects anomalies based on elevated errors with multi-channel notifications.
plugins.author: InfluxData

plugins.name: InfluxDB to Iceberg
plugins.description: Transfers data from InfluxDB 3 to Apache Iceberg tables with automatic schema management, customizable namespace and table naming, field filtering, and batch processing support.
plugins.author: InfluxData

plugins.name: MAD Anomaly Detection
plugins.description: Provides Median Absolute Deviation (MAD)-based anomaly detection using data writes trigger. Maintains in-memory deques for efficient computation and supports both count-based and duration-based thresholds.
plugins.author: InfluxData

plugins.name: Notification Sender
plugins.description: Standalone notification dispatcher that sends notifications through various channels (Slack, Discord, HTTP, SMS, WhatsApp) based on incoming HTTP requests. Features retry logic and environment variable support.
plugins.author: InfluxData

plugins.name: State Change Monitor
plugins.description: Provides field change and threshold monitoring capabilities through scheduler and data writes plugins. Detects changes in field values or threshold conditions with customizable notification templates.
plugins.author: InfluxData

plugins.name: ADTK Anomaly Detection
plugins.description: Provides anomaly detection capabilities for time series data using the ADTK library. Supports multiple stateless detectors with consensus-based detection and customizable notification messages.
plugins.author: InfluxData

plugins.name: Threshold and Deadman Checks
plugins.description: Provides comprehensive monitoring capabilities including deadman alerts and aggregation-based threshold checks. Supports both scheduler and data write triggers with multi-channel notifications.
plugins.author: InfluxData
